name: Love Island Deathmatch
description:
A broken top down shooter, a social commentary, a mans decent into madness, a better tomorrow by Wu-Tang Clan, a romantic comedy fantasy that is one of Bill Murrays best on screen performances.

The first thing I've ever made that's at least semi-functional and finished, kinda. First thing I've ever made in Gamemaker too.

Inspired by my lockdown madness, daytime tv, old Llamasoft games and some gamemaker tutorials/the gm discord. It's just a really basic endless shooter.

"Playable" with Mouse and Keyboard or Xbox/PS4 pads. Joypad controls are kinda scuff so it's best to just endure this game using wsad controls.
***N.B, Apparently the mouse/keyboard controls might be broken, if so use the pad for now, I'll fix asap***
